silver.name: AFK
silver.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

silver.name: Consistency
silver.desc: Gain double win and loss streak gold.

silver.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

silver.name: Lategame Specialist
silver.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 44 gold.

silver.name: Pandora's Bench
silver.desc: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

silver.name: Pandora's Items
silver.desc: Gain a random component. Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

silver.name: Recombobulator
silver.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 Tier higher. Gain @NumRemovers@ Magnetic Removers.

silver.name: Tiny Titans
silver.desc: Your Tactician heals 30 Health, grows larger, and has 130 maximum Health.

silver.name: Young and Wild and Free
silver.desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain a random component.

silver.name: Cybernetic Bulk I
silver.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 250 health.

silver.name: Cybernetic Leech I
silver.desc: Your units holding an item gain 80 Health and 13% Omnivamp.

silver.name: Latent Forge
silver.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil after 8 player combats.

silver.name: Unified Resistance I
silver.desc: If you have 3 or more units in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 18 Armor and Magic Resist.

silver.name: Silver Spoon
silver.desc: Gain 10 XP.

silver.name: Component Buffet
silver.desc: Gain a random component. Whenever you would get a random component, instead gain a component anvil.

silver.name: Inconsistency
silver.desc: If your streak is less than 2, gain 2 gold.

silver.name: Iron Assets
silver.desc: Gain a Component Anvil and 2 Gold.

silver.name: On a Roll
silver.desc: Whenever you star-up a champion, gain a free reroll. Gain 2 gold.

silver.name: Social Distancing I
silver.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 12% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

silver.name: One Twos Three
silver.desc: Gain 1 Tier one unit, 2 Tier two units, and 1 Tier three unit.

silver.name: Indomitable Will
silver.desc: When your units score a Takedown they shed all negative effects and become immune to Crowd Control for 10 seconds.

silver.name: Missed Connections
silver.desc: Gain a copy of each Tier One champion.

silver.name: Blood Money
silver.desc: Gain 1 gold per 3 Health your Tactician loses.

silver.name: Healing Orbs I
silver.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest allied unit is healed for 300.

silver.name: Shadow Isles Heart
silver.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shadow Isles. Gain a Viego and 1 gold.

silver.desc: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. This happens a second time after 7 player combats.

silver.desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 Player combats, gain 30 Gold.

silver.desc: Gain 1 random component, 2 Gold, and 1 random Tier 5 champion(s).

silver.desc: Your units without items equipped gain 30% Attack Speed.

silver.desc: Gain 10 Gold. In 4 turns, gain 10 Gold again.

silver.desc: Your units gain 8% Attack Speed. Each round, increase this by 0.5%.

silver.desc: Your team generates 10% more mana and moves 20% faster.

silver.name: Partial Ascension
silver.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 30% more damage.

silver.name: Seeing Double I
silver.desc: Gain a random item made from 2 of the same component and 2 gold.

silver.desc: Gain 10 free shop refreshes. These shop refreshes carry over between rounds.

silver.desc: Gain a random component, 4 gold, a Magnetic Remover.

silver.desc: Leveling up costs 3 XP less. You can now reach Level 10.

silver.desc: Gain a random component. Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

gold.name: Hustler
gold.desc: Instead of having no interest, you get 3 golds at the beginning of player combat rounds.

gold.name: Jeweled Lotus II
gold.desc: Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 15% Critical Strike chance.

gold.name: Last Stand
gold.desc: The first time you would be eliminated or reduced to 1 Health, instead remain alive. After this effect triggers, your units permanently gain 180 Health, 18 Armor and Magic Resist, and 18% Omnivamp.

gold.name: Metabolic Accelerator
gold.desc: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health after a PvP round.

gold.name: Portable Forge
gold.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 2 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

gold.name: Rich Get Richer
gold.desc: Gain 12 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

gold.name: Rich Get Richer+
gold.desc: Gain 18 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

gold.name: Salvage Bin
gold.desc: Gain a random completed item now, and a component after @NumRounds@ player combats. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

gold.name: Salvage Bin+
gold.desc: Gain a random completed item now, and a component after @NumRounds@ player combats. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

gold.name: Scoped Weapons
gold.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain +2 Attack Range and 15% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Three's Company
gold.desc: Gain 4 random Tier 3 champions.

gold.desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits and 5 gold.

gold.name: Trade Sector
gold.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round.

gold.name: Built Different II
gold.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 200-425 Health and 40-60% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

gold.name: Double Trouble II
gold.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 33% Attack Damage and 33 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

gold.name: Silver Ticket
gold.desc: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 30% chance to gain a free refresh.

gold.name: Cybernetic Bulk II
gold.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 350 health.

gold.desc: Gain a Blacksmith's Gloves, which equips two temporary Ornn Artifacts each round.

gold.desc: Your units holding an item gain 120 Health and 18% Omnivamp.

gold.name: Tons of Stats!
gold.desc: Your team gains 35 Health, 5% Attack Damage, 5 Ability Power, 5 Armor, 5 Magic Resist, 5% Attack Speed, and 5 Mana.

gold.name: Stars are Born
gold.desc: The first tier 1 unit and tier 2 unit you buy are upgraded to 2-star. Gain a 3 gold.

gold.name: Scrappy Inventions
gold.desc: At the start of combat, maximum of 5 components on your champions turn into  temporary items for the rest of combat. At the start of the next 2 stages, gain a component.

gold.name: Social Distancing II
gold.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 18% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

gold.desc: Your champions permanently gain 18 Health every time they kill an enemy. Champions start with 100 bonus Health.

gold.desc: Your champions permanently gain 1 Ability Power whenever they kill an enemy. Champions start with 15 bonus Ability Power.

gold.name: All That Shimmers
gold.desc: Gain a Shimmerscale Item armory that offers 3 options. Shimmerscale items aid gold generation.

gold.name: Shoplifting
gold.desc: After your first shop refresh each turn, gain the highest cost champion for free.

gold.name: Infusion
gold.desc: Your team restores 20 Mana every 5 seconds.

gold.name: Mana Burn
gold.desc: Gain a Shroud of Stillness. All enemies take 2% of their maximum health as true damage each second until the first time they cast their spell. No longer damages units without mana.

gold.name: Idealism
gold.desc: Gain a Hand of Justice. Champions with a Hand of Justice deal 13% increased damage.

gold.name: Healing Orbs II
gold.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest allied unit is healed for 500.

gold.name: Martyr
gold.desc: Whenever one of your units dies, all allies heal for 10% of Maximum health

gold.desc: Your units with no items equipped gain 150 Health and heal for 2% of their max Health each second.

gold.desc: Your Piltover units gain 7% Bonus Damage every 10 gold you have (Max: 40%), and have a 33% chance to drop 1 gold at round start. Gain an Ekko.

gold.desc: Your team gains 10% Omnivamp. Your Rogue units gain 20% instead. Gain 2 Rogues.

prismatic.name: Cruel Pact
prismatic.desc: Buying XP costs 5 Health instead of gold. Heal 2 Health before each player combat.

prismatic.name: Cursed Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain +2 maximum team size, but take 100% increased player damage.

prismatic.name: Golden Ticket
prismatic.desc: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 50% chance to gain a free refresh.

prismatic.name: Living Forge
prismatic.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil now and after every 10 player combats.

prismatic.name: Lucky Gloves
prismatic.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Level Up!
prismatic.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 3. Gain 2 immediately. You can now reach level 10.

prismatic.name: Radiant Relics
prismatic.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 5 unique Radiant items.

prismatic.name: March of Progress
prismatic.desc: Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

prismatic.name: The Golden Egg
prismatic.desc: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 11 turns. Victorious player combats accelerate the hatch timer by an additional turn.

prismatic.name: Built Different III
prismatic.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 270-600 Health and 50-70% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

prismatic.name: Double Trouble III
prismatic.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 44% Attack Damage and 44 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

prismatic.name: Woodland Charm
prismatic.desc: Your highest Health champion is cloned. Clones cannot hold items.

prismatic.name: Phreaky Friday
prismatic.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 Player combats, gain a second Infinity Force.

prismatic.name: Cybernetic Bulk III
prismatic.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 500 health.

prismatic.name: Starter Kit
prismatic.desc: Gain a Tier 4 champion, and a 2-star Tier 1 champion that shares a trait with them. At the next 1 stages, gain the Tier 4 champion again.

prismatic.name: Cybernetic Leech III
prismatic.desc: Your units holding an item gain 225 Health and 25% Omnivamp.

prismatic.name: Tactician's Tools
prismatic.desc: Gain two Spatulas.

prismatic.name: Social Distancing III
prismatic.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 25% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

prismatic.name: Final Reserves
prismatic.desc: The first time you would be eliminated or reduced to 1 Health, instead remain alive. After this effect triggers, at the beginning of your next planning phase gain 80 XP and 40 Gold.

prismatic.name: Roll The Dice
prismatic.desc: Gain a Radiant Thieves Gloves.

prismatic.name: What The Forge
prismatic.desc: All Completed items you own or receive are reforged into random Ornn Artifacts (excluding Tactician's Crown and Emblems). Units gain 160 Health per equipped Artifact.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund
prismatic.desc: You have no interest cap. Gain 22 gold.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund+
prismatic.desc: You have no interest cap. Gain 32 gold.

prismatic.name: Demacia Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Demacia Emblem, a Recurve Bow, and a Garen.

prismatic.name: Freljord Soul
prismatic.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Freljord. Gain an Archangel's Staff and a Lissandra.

prismatic.name: Ionia Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Ionia Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and a Karma.

prismatic.name: Noxus Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Noxus Emblem, a Sparring Gloves, and a Darius.

prismatic.name: Piltover Soul
prismatic.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Piltover. Gain a Giant Slayer and a Jayce.

prismatic.name: Shurima Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Shurima Emblem, a Protector’s Vow, and a Akshan.

prismatic.name: Targon Soul
prismatic.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Targon. Gain a Redemption and a Taric.

prismatic.name: Void Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Void Emblem, Zz'Rot Portal and a Rek'Sai.

prismatic.name: Zaun Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Zaun Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and an Ekko.

prismatic.name: Juggernaut Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Juggernaut Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Darius.

prismatic.name: Bastion Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bastion Emblem,  a Sunfire Cape, and a Taric.

prismatic.name: Bruiser Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Redemption, and a Rek'Sai.

prismatic.name: Challenger Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Challenger Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Kalista.

prismatic.name: Deadeye Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Deadeye Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and an Akshan.

prismatic.name: Multicaster Soul
prismatic.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Multicaster. Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet and a Vel'Koz.

prismatic.name: Invoker Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Invoker Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and a Karma.

prismatic.name: Rogue Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Rogue Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Katarina.

prismatic.name: Slayer Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Slayer Emblem, a Titan’s Resolve, and a Kled.

prismatic.name: Sorcerer Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Sorcerer Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Vel'Koz.

prismatic.name: Strategist Soul
prismatic.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Strategist. Gain a Chalice of Power and a Swain.

prismatic.name: Gunner Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Gunner Emblem, a Runann's Hurricane, and a Jayce.

prismatic.name: Jeweled Lotus III
prismatic.desc: Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 45% Critical Strike chance.

prismatic.name: Buried Treasures III
prismatic.desc: At the start of the next 5 rounds, gain a random item component.

prismatic.name: Endless Hordes
prismatic.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 20%. Gain 6 gold.

prismatic.name: Large Forge
prismatic.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil and a Component Item Anvil.

prismatic.name: Masterful Job
prismatic.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil and a Completed Item Anvil

prismatic.name: Harmacist III
prismatic.desc: Your units heal for 25% of the damage they deal, and they convert 30% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

prismatic.name: Knowledge Download III
prismatic.desc: Gain 36 XP.

prismatic.name: Pandora's Box
prismatic.desc: Gain a random Radiant item. Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

prismatic.name: Balanced Budget III
prismatic.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, Gain 11 Gold.

prismatic.name: Transfusion III
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 50 Health, plus 5 Health per missing Tactician Health.

prismatic.name: Spoils of War III
prismatic.desc: When you kill an enemy unit, there's a 40% chance to drop amazing loot.

prismatic.name: Money Money Money!
prismatic.desc: Gain 25 Gold. In 4 turns, gain 25 Gold again.

prismatic.name: Pumping Up III
prismatic.desc: Your units gain 12% Attack Speed. Each round, increase this by 2%.

prismatic.name: Battle Ready III
prismatic.desc: Your team deals 8% more damage and takes 8% less damage.

prismatic.name: Tiniest Titan
prismatic.desc: Your tactician is small and speedy, heals 2 Health after a PVP round, and grants 2 Gold per round.

prismatic.name: Gotta Go Fast!!! III
prismatic.desc: Your team generates 35% more mana and moves 50% faster.

prismatic.name: Tiny Power III
prismatic.desc: Your units gains 16% Attack Damage, Ability Power, and Attack Speed.

prismatic.name: Final Ascension
prismatic.desc: Your units deal 15% more damage. After 15 seconds, this effect triples.

prismatic.name: Urf's Grab Bag
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 random components, a Champion Duplicator, and a Spatula.

prismatic.name: Seeing Double III
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 random items made from 2 of the same component and 4 gold.

prismatic.name: Rolling For Days III
prismatic.desc: Gain 25 free shop refreshes, These shop refreshes carry over between rounds.

prismatic.name: Item Grab Bag III
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 random full items and 8 Gold.

prismatic.name: Giant Grab Bag
prismatic.desc: Gain 3 random components, 10 gold, and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

prismatic.name: Well-Earned Comforts III
prismatic.desc: Your units gain 120 Health and 8% Attack Speed for each item equipped.

prismatic.name: Training Reward III
prismatic.desc: Gain 24 gold and a Champion Duplicator.

prismatic.name: It Pays to Learn III
prismatic.desc: Gain 20 XP and 16 gold.

prismatic.name: Shadow Isles Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Shadow Isles Emblem, a Tear of the Goddess, and a Kalista.

prismatic.name: Wandering Trainer
prismatic.desc: Gain 4 gold and a Training Dummy. It has 3 random emblems equipped, which cannot be removed.

prismatic.name: Wellness Trust
prismatic.desc: Round Start: Gain 3 gold. If you have at least 40 gold, your Tactician heals 2 Health.

prismatic.name: Blinding Speed
prismatic.desc: Gain a Rapid Firecannon and a Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Impenetrable Bulwark
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bramble Vest and a Dragon's Claw, a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Unleashed Arcana
prismatic.desc: Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet and a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: Overwhelming Force
prismatic.desc: Gain a Deathblade and an Infinity Edge, a Magnetic Remover.

prismatic.name: High End Sector
prismatic.desc: Gain 1 gold per round. When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level.

prismatic.name: Caretaker's Chosen
prismatic.desc: As you level, gain more powerful items. At level 4 - gain a Component Anvil, at level 6 - gain a Completed Item Anvil, at level 8 - open a radiant item armory.

prismatic.name: Living Forge
prismatic.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil now and after every 10 player combats.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund
prismatic.desc: You have no interest cap. Gain 16 gold.

prismatic.name: Jeweled Lotus III
prismatic.desc: Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 45% Critical Strike chance.

prismatic.name: Spoils of War III
prismatic.desc: When you kill an enemy unit, there's a 40% chance to drop amazing loot.

prismatic.name: Tiniest Titan
prismatic.desc: Your tactician is small and speedy, heals 2 Health after a PVP round, and grants 2 Gold per round.

prismatic.name: Ancient Archives II
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 Tome of Traits and 3 gold.

prismatic.name: Level Up!
prismatic.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 3. Gain 4 immediately. You can now reach level 10.

prismatic.name: Pumping Up III
prismatic.desc: Your units gain 12% Attack Speed. Each round, increase this by 2%. (current Attack Speed: %)

prismatic.name: Buried Treasures III
prismatic.desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 5 rounds. Now starts granting items the round the augment is selected.

prismatic.name: Shopping spree
prismatic.desc: Gain 1 gold per round. When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level, which carry over your rounds.

prismatic.name: Transfusion III
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 50 Health, plus 5 Health per missing Tactician Health.

prismatic.name: Pandora's Box
prismatic.desc: Gain a random Radiant item. Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

prismatic.name: Caretaker's Chosen
prismatic.desc: As you level, gain more powerful items. At level 4 - gain a Component Anvil, at level 6 - gain a Completed Item Anvil, at level 7 - open a radiant item armory.

prismatic.name: Starter Kit
prismatic.desc: Gain a Tier 4 champion, and a 2-star Tier 2 champion that shares a trait with them. At the next 1 stages, gain the Tier 4 champion again.

prismatic.name: Phreaky Friday+
prismatic.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 Player combats, gain a second Infinity Force.

prismatic.name: Infernal Contract
prismatic.desc: Your max level is 7. Gain 85 Gold.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund++
prismatic.desc: You have no interest cap. Gain 44 gold.

prismatic.name: Endless Hordes+
prismatic.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size. Your units can only hold 1 item. Gain 12 gold.

champion.name: The Boss
champion.desc: Gain a Sett. The first time your strongest Sett falls below 60% Health, he takes a break to do sit-ups. Each sit-up heals him 10% of his max Health and grants 45% Attack Speed and Ability Power.

champion.name: Ravenous Hunter
champion.desc: Gain a Warwick. When your strongest Warwick takes or deals damage, he gains 5% Attack Damage and 5 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist, stacking up to 40 times.

champion.name: Riftwalk
champion.desc: Before casting, your strongest Kassadin gains 32 AP and blinks to the furthest enemy within 3 hexes, but his spell no longer disarms or shields. His mana cost is reduced by 30. Gain a Kassadin.

champion.name: Winds of War
champion.desc: Gain a Galio. Your strongest Galio's spell is larger, and enemies hit take magic damage equal to 8% of their max Health each second.

champion.name: Demonflare
champion.desc: Gain a Swain. Your strongest Swain deals 4% increased damage per 100 max Health.
